labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify That The User Is Able To Purchase A Product Using A Registered Email Id

name: Validate_User_Is_Able_To_Purchase_Product_Using_Registered_Email_Id
description:
Test Steps:

1- Go To ( http://live.techpanda.org/ )
2- Click On My Account Link
3- Login In Application Using Previously Created Credential
4- Click On My Wishlist Link
5- In Next Page, Click Add To Cart Link
6- Click Proceed To Checkout
7- Enter Shipping Information
8- Click Estimate
9- Verify Shipping Cost Generated
10- Select Shipping Cost, Update Total
11- Verify Shipping Cost Is Added To Total
12- Click 'Proceed To Checkout'
13- Enter Billing Information
14- In Shipping Method, Click Continue
15- In Payment Information, Select 'Check/Money Order' Radio Button. Click Continue
16- Click 'Place Order' Button
17- Verify Order Is Generated. Note The Order Number.

Expected Result:

- Flat Rate Shipping Of $5 Is Generated.
- Shipping Cost Is Added To Total Product Cost.
- Order Is Placed And Order Number Is Generated.

Actual Result:

- Flat Rate Shipping Of $5 Is Generated Successfully.
- Total Product Cost IS Shown.
- Order Is Placed Successfully.

Priority:

- High
